response.answer_text: you can buy a type C->HDMI cable, to HDMI input to your TV, but this may need your smartphone support, no need network.if you are a iPhone, you can use Airplay(how to use Airplay), and install a free Airplay Receiver on your smart tv, just need in the same lanif you are an Android Phone, you can use Miracast(how to use Miracast) or Google Cast, but this maybe need a hardware dongle, you can buy one from amazon, it is very cheaper. no need internet, just need wifior you can use some software solutions on your android phone, but this may be no audio, just video/screen to your smart tv. you also can download some free Wireless Display Receiver to your smart tv. and install free Wireless Display Sender to your smart android phone. no need internet, just need in the same lan.

Hey, I usually use Miracast to mirror my Android to LG TV. You can find my details in this article. How to Connect Android to LG TV? Here the steps you can refer to: Insert your Miracast receiver to your TV with the use of an HDMI cable and USB cable. Then, turn on and select HDMI mode on the list.On your Android phone, proceed to the phone settings and select “Cast Screen”. Search for the Miracast device and tap it on to link.Your phone is now mirrored on your LG TV.
